api-errors-messages.bad-request: The data entered was not in the correct format.

campaign-creation.external-user-id-required: Please specify the type of external user ID which the participants will be required to fill when starting the personalised test.
campaign-creation.purpose-required: Please select the purpose of your campaign: assess participants or collect their profiles.
campaign-creation.target-profile-required: Please select a target profile for your campaign.

api-errors-messages.default: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

edit-student-number.student-number-exists: The student number entered is already used by {firstName} {lastName}

api-errors-messages.global: An error occurred. Please try again later.

student-csv-import.bad-csv-format: The file must be in csv format with comma or semicolon separator.
student-csv-import.field-date-format: Row {line} : The field “{field}” must be in the format dd/mm/yyyy.
student-csv-import.field-email-format: Row {line} : The field “{field}” must be a valid email address.
student-csv-import.field-length: Row {line} : The field “{field}” must contain {limit} characters.
student-csv-import.field-max-length: Row {line} : The field “{field}” must contain less than {limit} characters.
student-csv-import.field-min-length: Row {line} : The field “{field}” must contain at least {limit} characters.
student-csv-import.header-unknown: Column headers must be identical to the ones on the template.
student-csv-import.ina-format: Row {line} : The field “{field}” (INA) must contain 10 numbers followed by 1 letter.
student-csv-import.ina-unique: Row {line} : The field “{field}” of this row is repeated several times within the file.
student-csv-import.insee-code-invalid: Row {line} : The field “{field}” is not in the INSEE format.
student-csv-import.student-number-format: Row {line} : The field “{field}” must not contain any special characters.
student-csv-import.student-number-unique: Row {line} : The field “{field}” must be unique within the file.

campaigns.message: Please note that you must check if the students are ''eligible to certification'' before signing them up on certification sessions. You can do a '<'a href={documentationLink} class={externalLinkClasses} target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"'>'profile collection campaign {faIcon}'' to be sure.

import.link-to: import or reimport the students database
import.message: Start of school year: the ''admin'' must {linkTo} to start using Pix Orga. Learn more on '<'a href={middleSchoolDocumentationLink} class={externalLinkClasses} target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"'>'middle schools {faIcon}'' and '<'a href={highSchoolDocumentationLink} class={externalLinkClasses} target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"'>'high schools {faIcon}''

action.select-page-size: Select the number of items by page

credits.number: {count, plural, =0 {0 credits} =1 {1 credit} other {{count, number} credits}}
credits.tooltip-text: The number of credits displayed is the number of credits acquired by the organisation and currently valid (regardless of their activation). For more information, please contact us at the following address: pro@pix.fr

landing-page-text.label: Text to display on the starting page

campaign-creation.legal-warning: *In accordance with the French law governing computer technology and freedoms (“Informatique et Libertés”), and as data controller, please be careful not to ask for significant or identifying personal data unless it is absolutely necessary. Asking for social security numbers, as well as any sensitive data, is strictly prohibited.

login-form.active-or-retrieve: Activate or retrieve your Pix Orga workspace
login-form.invitation-already-accepted: This invitation has already been accepted. Please log in or contact the administrator of your Pix Orga workspace.
login-form.is-only-accessible: Pix Orga is only accessible to invited members. Please contact your Pix Orga administrator in order to be invited.

status.401-should-change-password: An error occurred. Please change your password.
status.403: Access to this Pix Orga workspace is limited to invited members. Each Pix Orga workspace is managed by an administrator specific to the organisation using it. Please contact your administrator to get invited.

students-sco.agri-tooltip:
Some information about import:
  • For your students: use the FREGATA export towards Pix and click on the import button.
  • For your trainees: Pix imports all trainees at the end of November into your Pix Orga workspace. From December on, you will be able to add trainees from time to time. To do so, consult the Pix Orga documentation and use the template provided.

import.error-wrapper: {message} Please try again or contact us through the help form.
import.global-error: Import has failed. Please edit your file and try to import it again.
import.global-success: The list has been successfully imported.

error.default: An error occurred, our teams are working on finding a solution. Please try again later.
error.unexpected: Something went wrong. Please try again.

will no longer have access to this Pix Orga workspace.
The campaigns created by this member will still be accessible to the rest of the team.

team-new.title: Invite a member
team-new.email-requirement: Enter here the email address of the member you want to invite.
team-new.several-email-requirement: Invite several members by separating the email addresses with commas.
team-new.invited-members: By clicking on the link provided in the invitation, the invited members will be able to create an account or log in with an existing Pix account.
